title: Ep. - 317 - THE CROWN: FACT V FICTION DIVORCE ATTORNEY ON GIRARDI V GIRARDI
description:
Famed divorce attorney Dan Jaffe gives insight into the divorce of Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star Erika Girardi and her husband attorney Tom Girardi.

 

Nick Bullen is CEO of Spun Gold, and dubbed “The King of Royal TV.” Throughout his career, Nick has built a rare and much cherished broadcast relationship with the British Royal Family. He answers questions about season 4 of The Crown on Netflix, fact versus fiction.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/

Facebook.com/loveandknuckles
